description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the Dynamic Leisure & Entertainment IntellidexSM Index.
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in common stocks of leisure companies and entertainment companies that comprise the underlying intellidex. The underlying intellidex was composed of common stocks of 30 U.S. leisure and entertainment companies. These companies are engaged principally in the design, production or distribution of goods or services in the leisure and entertainment industries. The fund is non-diversified.
